item.title: SFF PC
item.description: It was time to upgrade my desktop computer, and for this build I wanted to assemble a PC as small and silent as possible, while keeping it relatively powerful and with enough space for a full-fledged graphics card. The term Small Form Factor refers to desktop computers using smaller size components in order to minimize their volume. To achiveve that, these computers usually rely on form factors that are smaller than the typical ones.
